G

Game - Class in model
The Game class represents a game in the UNO game.
Game(Account) - Constructor for class model.Game
Constructs a new game with the given account.
Game.Flipped - Enum in model
An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
Game.GameDirection - Enum in model
The GameDirection enumeration represents the direction of play in the UNO game.
